TopicTitle: Airbrakes still deploying even if EC is depleted

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: W indows 10 | CPU: i5 12400f | GPU: Radeon RX 6600 | RAM: 16gb 3200mHz

 

If a probe controlled Vessel is out of EC, the airbrakes are still deploying like normal. This only works when pressing the Brake action key, not when pressing the icon in the bottom left. 

This bug is easily reproducable.

Edited October 31, 2023 by The Space Peacock
